entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:12 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 12:41 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: SSW 28 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow or ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
